# AttributeScopes.FoundationAttributes.ReferentConceptAttribute

**Enumeration**

An attribute that specifies a grammatical agreement concept for substituting pronouns in localized text.

## Declaration

```swift
@frozen enum ReferentConceptAttribute
```

## Overview

Use the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/AttributeScopes/FoundationAttributes/referentConcept] formatting attribute for cases where you need to refer to a person using their preferred pronoun in a string.

For an example of how to use a `referentConcept`, see [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/TermOfAddress].

## Using automatic grammar agreement attributes

- **inflect**: A scope for accessing an inflection rule attribute.
- **AttributeScopes.FoundationAttributes.InflectionRuleAttribute**: A type for using an inflection rule as an attribute.
- **agreementArgument**: A scope for accessing an agreement argument attribute.
- **AttributeScopes.FoundationAttributes.AgreementArgumentAttribute**: An attribute that represents grammatical agreement with an argument in a localized string.
- **agreementConcept**: A scope for accessing an agreement concept attribute.
- **AttributeScopes.FoundationAttributes.AgreementConceptAttribute**: An attribute that represents grammatical agreement for objects that aren’t part of the inflected text.
- **morphology**: A scope for accessing a morphology attribute.
- **AttributeScopes.FoundationAttributes.MorphologyAttribute**: A type for using a morphology as an attribute.
- **referentConcept**: A scope for accessing a referent concept attribute.
- **inflectionAlternative**: A scope for accessing an inflection alternative attribute.
- **AttributeScopes.FoundationAttributes.InflectionAlternativeAttribute**: An attribute that provides an alternative inflection phrase when the system can’t achieve grammatical agreement.

## Conforms To

- AttributedStringKey
- BitwiseCopyable
- Copyable
- DecodableAttributedStringKey
- EncodableAttributedStringKey
- MarkdownDecodableAttributedStringKey
